Twenty - Seven Heidi Saturday morning started like any other day . [The world]608-the world turned . The sun rose . Life went on . Except it did n’t . Today was the only day of the year that [my]49-matt life did n’t go on . Today was the day that [[my]49-matt dad]195-my old man had been charged and sentenced to [prison]939-prison . [Landon]77-heidi had wanted to stay the night .
